definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
system for identifying users (on a rail network, the Internet etc)

sentences.english: Then again, Facebook is a real-name business, not a place for dissidents to go into hiding.
sentences.chinese: 而且脸谱网是实名业务，让异见者无处藏身。

sentences.english: Real-name authentication or international domain name registrar behavior?
sentences.chinese: 国际域名实名认证或为注册商行为？

sentences.english: If the informant offers the tipoff in his (its) real name, he (it) shall be given a reply about the handling result and other information.
sentences.chinese: 对实名举报的，应当将处理结果等情况予以回复。

sentences.english: Please do not force them to use a real-name system.
sentences.chinese: 请不要强迫他们使用实名制。

sentences.english: China's mobile phone users will have to register using their real names starting next year, according to the Ministry of Information Industry (MII).
sentences.chinese: 据信息产业部消息，我国将从明年起启动手机实名制。

sentences.english: Passengers could only book real name tickets by phone before Monday.
sentences.chinese: 在周一前，乘客只能通过点火预订实名制火车票。

sentences.english: This makes the controversial network real-name registration system for years clear.
sentences.chinese: 这使得争议多年的网络实名制发展方向变得明朗。

sentences.english: We have your real-paid salaries entered into your employees' real-name accounts in compliance with your instructions.
sentences.chinese: 我行根据贵单位指令直接将工资转入职工的实名账户。

sentences.english: The applying of law in the disputes between the similar real-name networks.
sentences.chinese: 相似网络实名之间冲突中的法律适用问题。

sentences.english: Jack: I think the real-name system can effectively crack down on scalpers.
sentences.chinese: 我认为实名制可能有效地打击黄牛党。

sentences.english: South Korea's real name to be abolished in stages as frequency of personal information stolen.
sentences.chinese: 个人信息频被盗用，韩国拟分阶段废除网络实名。

sentences.english: People purchasing large amounts of prepaid cards will soon have to reveal their real names.
sentences.chinese: 今后购买大量预支费卡将实行实名制。

sentences.english: The train ticket is lost, how to handle the loss formalities?
sentences.chinese: 在列车上丢失实名制车票，如何办理挂失补办手续？

sentences.english: I think the real-name system can effectively crack down on scalpers.
sentences.chinese: 我认为实名制可能有效地打击黄牛党。

sentences.english: Time to get 'real' on China's Internet .
sentences.chinese: 国新办称，现在的中国互联网必须推行实名制。

sentences.english: Jack:I think the real-name system can effectively crack down on the ticket scalpers.
sentences.chinese: 我认为实名制可能有效地打击黄牛党。

definition: system for identifying users (on a rail network, the Internet etc)
binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
record entry (e.g. into a bank passbook)
to report (malefactors to the police)/to denounce
